Author: bunchofbroccoli
Text: Lol I feel this. With my ex I would constantly try to downplay in order to avoid drawing attention to my ED. Then if he ever agreed with me, I'd get upset because he was agreeing that I'm not sick enough.  Me: "Don't worry, it's really not that bad, I have it under control."  Him: "You're right, it's not that bad."  Me: WHAT? Yes it is, clearly I'm sick and need help. Are you saying I'm not sick enough?!  &#x200B;  Like what lol

Author: sma123456789
Text: I hate when people downplays it. Its like telling me that me looking fucking skinny is attractive. I mean thanks, i appreciate it. But my brain does not need to be feed with the thoughs of any of this being okay. Or "manageble" because if thats the case, well then ill keep going. Fuck
